Introduction
============

'collective.js.uilayout' provides a JQuery plugin.

This plugin makes UI.Layout available in plone.

See http://layout.jquery-dev.net/ for more information about this plugin.

The version number for this product is kept in sync with the version number
of the plugin.


Upgrade Notes:
--------------

To upgrade from a version earlier than 1.2.0.3 you need to reinstall the
product via the ZMI portal_quickinstall tool.
